headline: Constellation Energy Corporation Declares Dividend
summary: BALTIMORE, April 29, 2025--The Board of Directors of Constellation Energy Corporation (Nasdaq: CEG) declared a quarterly dividend of $0.3878 per share on Constellation’s common stock. The dividend is payable on June 6, 2025, to shareholders of record as of 5 p.m. Eastern time on May 16, 2025.
